tool_description: Simple referral service that generates referral ID and allocates rewards
name: Simple Referral
title: Simple Referral

api_list.name: Get List of Allocated Rewards
api_list.description: Return the list of the Rewards that allocated to one user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-referral.p.rapidapi.com/referral/rewards/prd_z0zbvc6x-61646d696e/dts0vrk5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-referral.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-referral.p.rapidapi.com/referral/rewards/{id}/{userreferralcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-referral.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Rewards
api_list.description: You can get your defined rewards using this route
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-referral.p.rapidapi.com/prd_z0zbvc6x-61646d696e/get-rewards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-referral.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
